articles.title: Brookfield raises $15 bln for climate-focused fund - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's Brookfield Asset Management (BAMa.TO), said on Wednesday it had raised $15 billion for its first impact fund focused on the global transition to a net-zero carbon economy.
articles.content: June 22 (Reuters) - Canada's Brookfield Asset Management (BAMa.TO), said on Wednesday it had raised $15 billion for its first impact fund focused on the global transition to a net-zero carbon economy… [+1844 chars]
